extendedInfo.description: ABOUT AGU: The American Geophysical Union (AGU) is a worldwide scientific community of 61,000 members representing 146 countries. Dedicated to achieving its mission of promoting discovery in Earth and space science for the benefit of humanity, AGU works to provide a collaborative forum for the geophysical community through its publications, meetings and other services, as well as to be an authoritative voice within the global scientific community and among the public and policy makers. ABOUT FALL MEETING: AGUâs Fall Meeting is the largest gathering of Earth and space scientists in the world, attracting more than 20,000 Earth and space scientists, educators and students. Attendees can connect with colleagues, learn about new and ongoing research in a variety of disciplines, and embrace the joy of science.

reviews.title: Fine
reviews.comment: I used this app mutiple times during the conference, and it had no stability issues. I liked it more than the daily paper, but there are a lot of ways it could be improved. For example, a \"home\" button would have been nice. In addition, the overall organization was weird.
reviews.author: Neil Barton

reviews.title: Very frustrating
reviews.comment: Do not waste time downloading.
reviews.author: Nicholas Meskhidze

reviews.title: Keeps getting worse.
reviews.comment: AGU\'s app gets worse each year. Won\'t load at all.
reviews.author: Alexander Robinson

reviews.title: Needs lots of work
reviews.comment: In session lists of talks or posters, the presenting author should be listed right after the title. Having to click on the talk snd then the abstract to find out who is presenting is ridiculous.
reviews.author: Craig Kletzing

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Searching for author, abstract, session, or anything is near impossible. Doesn\'t sync with itinerary. The maps have no context and are low resolution.
reviews.author: Carlye Peterson

reviews.title: Crash
reviews.comment: App crashes after update. There goes my schedule for the day. Going home. What are you thinking??? So, what am I going to do tomorrow???
reviews.author: Haje Korth

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: It was slow and kept crashing my phone. After  the update it doesn\'t open at all. Interface left a lot to be desired to begin with
reviews.author: Alexandrina Tzanova

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: Crashes, slow to update, not very easy to search through talks.
reviews.author: Kyle Peet

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Too many bugs, no utility
reviews.author: Carlo Vinci

reviews.title: Terrible start
reviews.comment: This app is a total waste of time and money. It is unable to download updates and refuses to start... Really disappointed.
reviews.author: Mustapha Mokrane

reviews.title: Worst app for any conference
reviews.comment: Many conferences offer dedicated apps these days. None of them are perfect, but this is by far the worst. It\'s amazing that AGU with 20,000+ attendants cannot pay for a better software.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is painful to use
reviews.comment: If you want to see what\'s on in the afternoon on Monday, say, you have to scroll through every single session in every single section? Is that right? I would search by track, but Atmospheric Sciences isn\'t on the list.
reviews.author: Tim Dransfield

reviews.title: Good ideas poor execution
reviews.comment: Sloppy display of my schedule.  Poster and oral sessions should have different colors.  Individual talks should be down inside bookmarked sessions.  Disappointing
reviews.author: Ian Fenty

reviews.title: Slow and painful
reviews.comment: Trying to plan my schedule on this app is incredibly frustrating. The itinerary planner on the website has a better interface, and is more responsive. I was really looking forward to having a smartphone with an app this year, but after this frustration, I\'ll stick with printouts from the Itinerary Planner. Why on Earth can\'t you sync the itinerary planner to the app?!?
reviews.author: Topher Hughes

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Spends ages updating at the beginning and then finally tells me that I don\'t have an internet connection -- even when I do! I uninstalled it after two days of trying.
reviews.author: Khurom Kiyani

reviews.title: So so
reviews.comment: The app is quite stable on my Xperia Arc S, but certainly has many annoying drawbacks: -- You cannot use the app during sync, which doesn\'t have to be true for updates that don\'t involve your schedule or other critical updates. -- Looking at program by track - it keeps title \"Schedule Program\", instead of replacing it with track name. If you choose oral or poster - same thing, instead of e.g. Biogeochemistry:Oral etc. -- Bookmarking particular talks or abstracts is hard since you have to open the talk two layers down, it doesn\'t have a star icon next to talk title. -- In session has topics-authors-abstracts subsections, topics are exactly the same as abstracts, but if you click on topic, it is higher level. -- Once you bookmark it, or even look at the talk and go back to session level - it returns you to the top of the session, which is particularly annoying with long poster sessions. -- When I add new session it keeps reminding that I already have something planned for the time. It is fine for oral, but for posters it is supposed to be this way, especially since they are 6 hour long sessions. -- Search by topic returns Dec 31 as a day for all results, which is not true.
reviews.author: Iurii Shcherbak

reviews.title: Piece of crap
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem like you can put an itinerary done on a computer on your mobile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Awful and completely useless application. Web site also not good because of low bandwidth I guess. It is very hard to create your schedule at the Web site and use it on your phone. There is no map of the streets, how to go from one building to another, and how to find the building location at all? The update system block the application, without mobile internet you cannot use it.
reviews.author: Alexander Drozdov

reviews.comment: I really cannot search abstracts in the windows of abstract titles labeled \"search abstracts\"?\tIs it just me? I sure don\'t see a way to do this so... Why is it called \"search abstracts\"? I HOPE it is just something I\'m missing.
reviews.author: David Knapp

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t even download the updates.
reviews.comment: Hard to tolerate an app like this that won\'t stay current.
reviews.author: Dennis B
